title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6180.2 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6180.2 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth minimum standards
for notices of parking violations and to establish uniform procedures, consistent with due process requirements, for the processing of parking
violations issued in the affected cities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6180.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
